description: Detects usage of Metasploit SMB PsExec (exploit/windows/smb/psexec) and Impacket psexec.py by triggering on specific service installation Author: Bartlomiej Czyz, Relativity. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Possible, different agents with a 8 character binary and a 4, 8 or 16 character service name
name: Metasploit Or Impacket Service Installation Via SMB PsExec
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND (winlog.event_id:"4697" AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:/^%systemroot%\\[a-zA-Z]{8}\.exe$/ AND winlog.event_data.ServiceName:/(^[a-zA-Z]{4}$)|(^[a-zA-Z]{8}$)|(^[a-zA-Z]{16}$)/ AND ServiceStartType:"3" AND winlog.event_data.ServiceType:"0x10") AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.ServiceName:"PSEXESVC")))
